attributes.action: make clear that not all Muslims are responsible for the actions of ISIS
attributes.additional_details: the Islamic State attacks on Paris are the major cause of the declaration of war and the attacks killed 130 people. this is the attacks of a so called Islamic state. this isn't Muslims this is extremists!
attributes.background: i want to take action as i am a Muslim myself and to be seen and treated  as if i am responsible for the attacks committed by the Islamic state is just pure discrimination against me and my religion. A change is needed to be mad and fast!

rejection.details:
We are not sure what action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take to address this issue.

You might want to start a new petition which includes a clear request for action from the Government or Parliament.
